members.name: Karin Mobring
members.description: It was love at first sight when Ingvar Kamprad spotted a wooden chair by a designer named Karin Mobring in 1964. With an eye for materials and a talent for designing comfortable, quality furniture with wide appeal, Karin was about to become the first female IKEA designer.

members.name: Hagberg
members.description: Meet Marianne and Knut – they've designed over 2100 products for IKEA; everything from toys to toothbrush holders to tables. As subjects of the successful retrospective exhibition Hagberg + Hagberg, we pay tribute to the siblings who just might be the world’s most prolific design duo.

members.name: OBEGRANSAD
members.description: Home is the new studio! Created together with electronic music artists, Swedish House Mafia, this just-launched collection helps music makers and other creatives to find their state of flow, wherever they call home.

members.name: Miami
members.description: Apparently even the Swedish House Mafia – who provided the playlist to many of our pre-teen years – isn’t immune to the multidisciplinary urge of creatives living in this new age.
